sentences.en: Any faults in the original cider stood out sharply after distillation.
sentences.cn: 原先苹果酒里的任何杂质在蒸馏后都会凸现出来。

sentences.en: At the bar he ordered a cider.
sentences.cn: 他在酒吧点了一杯苹果汁。

sentences.en: Cider also goes up by a penny a pint while sparkling wine will cost another eight pence a bottle.
sentences.cn: 苹果酒每品脱也涨了1便士，而汽酒则每瓶涨了8便士。

sentences.en: Cider is made out of apples.
sentences.cn: 苹果酒是用苹果酿造的.

sentences.en: Cider making was a sideline for many farmers.
sentences.cn: 酿造苹果酒是很多农民的一项副业.

sentences.en: He broached a barrel of cider.
sentences.cn: 他钻孔开了一桶苹果酒.

sentences.en: In Europe a large tonnage of apples is grown specifically for the manufacture of cider.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲,有很大部分的苹果是用来作苹果酒.

sentences.en: It was the night that I had the hard cider.
sentences.cn: 那已经是晚上了,我喝了点烈性酒.

sentences.en: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentences.cn: 肉豆蔻、西芹和苹果酒都能很好地突出这些豆子的味道。

sentences.en: Place the saucepan over moderate heat until the cider is very hot but not boiling.
sentences.cn: 把炖锅置于中火上加热，直到苹果酒变得很烫，但不要加热到沸腾。

sentences.en: Pour cider around the meat and cover with foil.
sentences.cn: 在肉周围倒上苹果酒，然后以箔纸覆盖。

sentences.en: They imbibed the local cider before walking home to dinner.
sentences.cn: 他们在走回家吃饭之前喝了本地的苹果酒.

sentences.en: They sell cider at 10 dollars a cask.
sentences.cn: 他们以每桶十美元的价钱出售苹果酒.

sentences.en: This could put cider back on the map as one of our great national drinks.
sentences.cn: 这样可以让苹果酒再度名扬四方，成为我们重要的国酒之一。

sentences.en: Two glasses of cider and a beer, please.
sentences.cn: 请来两杯苹果汁和一杯啤酒.

trans.tran_cn: <美>（用作饮料或制醋用的）苹果汁，<英>苹果酒
trans.tran_en: an alcoholic drink made from apples, or a glass of this drink
